title: Three-point correlation functions in $N=1$ Super Lioville Theory
abstract: In this letter we propose exact three-point correlation functions for $N=1$ supersymmetric Liouville theory. Along the lines of Zamolodchikov and Zamolodchikov paper (hep-th/9506136) we propose a generalized special function which describe the three-point amplitudes. We consider briefly the so called reflection amplitudes in the supersymmetric case.
